Portfolio

About

Zach Dyer Design is a web design company providing graphic, web, and interface design in Ozark, Missouri where we help small businesses get online and exposed to their potential and current customers.

Whether you're a small business looking to get online, a professional looking to attract clients, or a company looking to brand your business, our web design is the perfect starting point!

Around the Web

Who Are We

Zach Dyer Design is a web design company providing graphic, web, and interface design in Ozark, Missouri where we help small businesses get online and exposed to their potential and current customers.

Copyright © Zach Dyer Design 2016

Brik Masonry

When Zach Dyer talked to Brik with Brik Masonry on the phone, Brik said he had just talked to his wife about getting a website. Brik hired Zach Dyer Design to design his website and an online employment application so that applicants can apply online for his masonry company.

  • Client: Brik Masonry
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Missouri Tile

The largest tile company in Southwest Missouri with 5000 square foot showroom hired Zach Dyer Design to design a company logo and site. The site is live at MissouriTile.biz.

  • Client: Missouri Tile
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Born To Bore

When Zach Dyer Design and L & B Services were Located at the Carl G. Hefner Enterprise Center L & B hired Zach Dyer Design to design there website. After the site went live the client got a call in 20 minutes!

  • Client: L & B Services
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Tope Insurance

After Julie Tope with Tope Insurance met Zach Dyer at the Elks Lodge in Ozark, Missouri, Julie hired Zach to build her website and manage her email service. Julie has been doing business with Zach Dyer Design since 2011.

  • Client: Tope Insurance
  • Date: April 2011
  • Service: Web Development

South Law

A large law firm in Kansas City with over 90 attorneys on staff hired Zach Dyer Design to build a website for their company brand.

  • Client: South Law
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Heard Dentistry

Heard Professional Dentistry contacted and hired Zach Dyer Design to program a website based on a finished design.

  • Client: Heard Professional Dentistry
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development
